citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:40 AM on
05-Oct-16.
Called number upon arrival at facility, manager answered and asked me to call the owner via cell phone. Called
facility owner, who was out of state on a delivery and he will provide a schedule of when he is available for
inspection via email. Discussed attempted inspection procedure with facility owner.

narrative:
2.126(b)
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:40 AM on
05-Oct-16.
Called number upon arrival at facility, manager answered and asked me to call the owner via cell phone.  Called
facility owner, who was out of state on a delivery and he will provide a schedule of when he is available for
inspection via email.  Discussed attempted inspection procedure with facility owner.
